The user farts on his target, causing an abnormal status. In ''[[Naruto: Path of the Ninja]]'' it poisons the target, while in ''[[Jump Super Stars]]'' it slows down the target. 

== Trivia ==
* In an [[omake]] following one of the ''[[Naruto: Shippūden]]'' episodes, Naruto claims that it is a [[Wind Release]] technique, but before he can use it, he gets punched by [[Sakura]].

[[es:Tiro Ligero]]
[[pt-br:Peido]]
[[pl:Onara]]
